file_content.text: Our work here is finished. Go enjoy my planet.
Darth Lachris. Grand Marshal Cheketta is defeated, and the Balmorran Arms Factory is broken.
You smell like smoke and blood. Let me show you something.
My forces received supplies and intelligence from the Republic. We knowingly and illegally attacked Imperial targets by order of the Senate.
We broke the peace treaty that keeps our worlds whole, and for that, I apologize to all citizens of the galaxy.
There are protests on the streets of Coruscant. Republic ships are withdrawing from three sectors. You humiliated them.
Now that Balmorra is secure, what do you intend?
What happens next?
It wasn't about humiliation. It was about revealing the truth.
The lies had to be exposed.
If you like, though that wasn't my priority.
The Republic may have lost face, but they're not going to stop attacking.
It's a temporary victory.
No, but who really wants that?
On behalf of the Senate and the Supreme Chancellor, I wholeheartedly condemn the actions of these rogue soldiers on Balmorra.
They struck at Imperial targets without any Republic support. The Senate values its peace treaty with the Empire.
So embarrassing for the Senate, forsaking their own people.
Meanwhile, Imperial Intelligence has begun interrogating our captives. I'm giving the Jedi to Darth Marr, to see if they can be turned.
I know you wanted proof of Republic involvement. But you don't seem disappointed.
I'm glad you like the outcome.
You gave me something just as good.
Your enemies are beaten, and your position is secure. But our partnership doesn't have to end there.
[Flirt] Any more I can do?
Ha! Shall we take a walk among scorched ruins and skulls, discussing plans for the future?
I admit, you've put me in the mood to celebrate. Tell me why I should bother with you.
Here's why.
Simple. [Kiss her]
You're not one for words....
Aren't you curious about the man who won the war for you? You won't have another chance....
[Flirt] I'm the best.
Then let me explore.
How bold, for a man who should fear the Sith.
But you don't fear. What is it you see with those Force-blind eyes?
I see a risk worth taking.
I'll show you. [Kiss her]
Ha! Come with me, then....
You're a woman of strength and passion. Fear is the last thing on my mind.
[Flirt] Who could fear you?
Come with me. I have much to show you.
Mmm. It has been an enjoyable day.
I think you misinterpreted. Let's move on.
Forget I said anything.
As you like.
Bold, perhaps--and even tempting--but other duties call.
I did what an Imperial army couldn't do. I hope you appreciate that.
Some of my best work.
Oh, I do--I certainly do.
Interrogation and conversion aren't enough. They should be executed as an example.
They should all die.
All in good time, hmm?
I'm gathering troops for a clean sweep of the Balmorran Arms Factory--I'm making it my base of planetary operations.
My governorship would be very different without you. You have my gratitude for your assistance.
This planet is only the beginning. There are more enemies to defeat and conquer.
I have much more work to do.
You will go far among the Sith--I'm certain of that.
Working with another Sith is always... inspiring.
It's been a pleasure.
Perfectly said.
Remember it. Imperial Intelligence could use a friend in the Sith, someday.
You owe Intelligence a favor.
I don't forget my allies.
You made the better offer. Republic and Empire don't mean much to me.
I just did it for the money.
They will, someday.
The Balmorrans have suffered for a long time. If you want to end the resistance, show them the Empire is not their enemy.
Govern Balmorra with mercy.
I have my own plans for the people here... but I'll remember your advice.
Next time you need assistance, let me know. I have skills you haven't seen.
[Flirt] We'll do this again.
I'll remember it.
The last governor who failed was replaced by the Dark Council. Don't make his mistakes.
Don't mess things up.
He was nothing, and I am Sith. You should remember that.
It's time I return to ruling--there are new reports of resistance activity. Should you choose to remain on Balmorra, perhaps I'll call on you again.
The Balmorran Arms Factory awaits your touch.
Cheketta and the resistance are based in the Balmorran Arms Factory--home of the brightest engineers in the galaxy.
I'm told the factory's generators are inexhaustible, its defenses cutting-edge--its barricades block our scans, giving the resistance peace and privacy!
No fortress is invincible. There must be a structural vulnerability, potential traitors in the ranks....
It must have a weak point.
If the governor had done his job, we'd know--but there's no time anymore.
Sounds intolerable. After we're done here, maybe I can help you work out your frustrations.
[Flirt] You're getting angry.
Deliver me Balmorra, and we'll work out anything you like.
We can't hurt them--but they can't hurt us while they're contained in there.
But they're stuck. Trapped.
And what if they stop being contained?
That's hardly my problem.
Have I been too friendly? You're here to serve.
Cheketta may've officially gone rogue, but the Republic still supports him. They fund his revolution from the shadows, make supply drops in secret.
Those Republic hypocrites want the Arms Factory as a beachhead--and as Balmorra's new governor, I say we take it before they mount a full invasion.
I will burn our enemies' fortress to the ground. I swear it.
I'll lead the frontal assault.
You need power and a mind able to apply that power wisely. I can provide both.
Let me solve the problem.
One small team should be able to penetrate the defenses. It'll be dangerous, but I can handle it.
I can infiltrate the facility.
I can handle the assault. How much cash is in the treasury?
Work like that is costly.
Whatever hasn't been squandered or embezzled is yours.
If the Republic invades Balmorra, they'll be violating the peace with the Empire.
Would the Republic risk a war?
And if they act through mercenaries? A foreign government? They'll hide their involvement, but it'll be an invasion just the same.
You don't know the Republic is planning an invasion. You don't even know they're behind Cheketta and his men.
You're being paranoid.
It is my judgment--and either way, Balmorra is threatened.
Obliterate the factory defenses. Lower the barricades that block our scans, and I'll have an army at your back.
And if you can... bring me proof of Republic involvement on Balmorra. We'll expose their lies on a galactic stage.
Do you know the worst part, Governor?
I didn't--I didn't....
Exactly--you didn't even own up to your mistakes. That's why the Dark Council gave this planet to me.
[Wait and don't interfere]
Please....
Watch, and enjoy.
[Try to save the man]
Put the man down. Put him down now.
So much confidence. Such a commanding voice.
Thank you, my lord....
I think I like it.
We must forgive the mistakes of our lessers. I'm sure the governor would apologize if he had the opportunity.
Would he?
Yes. Please....
Very well.
I'm Darth Lachris, and I've been tasked with cleansing Balmorra. I'm glad you came--more Sith can only bring much-needed dignity.
Darth Lachris. It's time this planet met the rulers of the Empire.
The people need firm control.
Quite so.
Darth Lachris. How can Lord Zash's apprentice be of use?
I'm at your service.
Such a skilled tongue and respectful disposition. I shan't turn my back on you.
That man hardly seems a threat to you, my lord. And he can still be of service to the Empire.
You're very polite. But why do I suspect you have teeth?
Oh, go on--we're finished.
I'm Darth Lachris, and I'm here to cleanse Balmorra. Would you like to join me, agent? I hear you're very good at your job.
Leave us, agent. I would speak to Darth Lachris alone.
Let us speak alone, as Sith.
Cipher Nine, Imperial Intelligence. I might be able to spare resources.
I know how to handle myself.
You people can praise each other and the Empire all you like. I'll be out there working.
I'll leave you Imps alone.
Not a drop of fear in you. Don't leave so quickly.
The governor's footing my bill. Let the man pay up.
I was going to exact payment in flesh... but if you insist.
I am Darth Lachris, and I'm here to cleanse Balmorra. They say you're the best, bounty hunter... you're wasted working for those incompetents in Sobrik.
Leave us, bounty hunter. I would speak to Darth Lachris alone.
Let us speak alone, as Sith.
Let your servant stay.
You recognize talent in my ally--but I am the master here, not this Force-blind creature.
My associate is useful.
So you are. I never meant to imply otherwise.
Cipher Nine, Imperial Intelligence--I'm the one with the security clearance, and I'd like to know what's going on.
Let me introduce myself....
They may be incompetent, but the work pays dividends.
I choose my employers well.
I'm sure it does.
Gorgeous, murderous and an eye for talent. We should talk.
[Flirt] You're fun, Darth.
We should. Do you--ah, but business first.
How'd the Dark Council pick you for ruler of Balmorra?
Why'd the Sith send you?
My master felt I needed a challenge, and I agreed.
I don't care if you rule one planet or a thousand--nobody wastes my time.
Cut to the chase.
To business, then.
You're all here because I asked the governor to bring me his best. Balmorra has a problem.
You're here because I asked the governor to bring me his best. Balmorra has a problem.
My friends in the resistance. I won't take much time.
The Empire says it owns Balmorra. The Republic says "It's yours--we're gone!"
But you and I know Balmorra's won with sweat and tears--and my boys will stand by your side until everyone knows it.
Grand Marshal Cheketta, formerly of the Republic Army. Officially, he and his troops went rogue after the Republic withdrew from this sector.
Ever since, they've been holed up under siege, aiding the resistance and fortifying their position. You may've met their scouting parties already.
If these men are ex-Republic, aren't they violating the peace treaty?
Republic troops? Here?
Not so long as the Republic government denies any official involvement.
Grand Marshal Cheketta. What's his story?
I've never heard of this man.
A brute. He seems barely literate, but he took three sectors from us during the war.
Is there anyone on Balmorra who isn't fighting the Empire?
This planet really is a mess.
Now you understand my displeasure with the previous administration.
What are you doing here?
